problem.markdown: Select all that would be good applications for MapReduce: [x] Google search [x] Finding the number of times "the" appears in Hawthorne's "The Scarlet Letter." [x] Finding the most used word in a set of Tweets [] Running a desktop application (i.e. Microsoft Word, Adobe Photoshop, web browsers, etc.)
problem.p: Select all that would be good applications for MapReduce:

checkboxgroup.choice: Finding the number of times "the" appears in Hawthorne's "The Scarlet Letter."
Finding the most used word in a set of Tweets
Running a desktop application (i.e. Microsoft Word, Adobe Photoshop, web browsers, etc.)
